channel.title: Need help to make my server for everyone
channel.description:
I make a No-IP adres: * I run the server Then I try to connect and moparscape say:
Error connecting the server. Must be down Click Cancel the start server to make your own.
WHAT IS WRONG!!!

item.title: Need help to make my server for everyone
item.dc:creator: @Holy-Wings Holy-Wings
item.description:
@Holy-Wings wrote:

[quote=“1337 owns, post:5, topic:241803”][quote author=Holy-Wings link=topic=318172.msg2523485#msg2523485 date=1226063959]
Start > run > cmd > ipconfig /all > ip address copy&paste > paste on web browser address > go to gaming and applications. (port 43594 - 43594 : ip 192.0.0.1) all done. If you dont have router. you’ll have to use hamachi Here then make your own hamachi server… copy that address in bold writing. ask people to join and BAM a laggy as hell server. which is unstable and very bad secruity for your computer. hope I helped.
[/quote]He doesnt gotta go hamachi…he can just use utorrent. im not sure if theres a tut on how to do it though.[/quote]

To use uTorrent you have to have a router. other wise it will keep saying ‘Error - Port ‘xxxx’ is already in use.’

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to make my server for everyone

item.title: Need help to make my server for everyone
item.dc:creator: @hipio hipio
item.description:
@hipio wrote:

i have use portforwarding.
Now I use hamachi and it work.
Thank you.
ps sorry for my poor english. I’m dutch.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help to make my server for everyone
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“hipio, post:1, topic:241803”]I make a No-IP adres: *
I run the server
Then I try to connect and moparscape say:

Error connecting the server. Must be down
Click Cancel the start server to make your own.

WHAT IS WRONG!!![/quote]

Don’t post your ip you will be warned (or muted) and this will be locked…

And you probably didn’t port forward.
